docs.summary: Sets or gets whether an input element is required to have a value.
description: Setting the `required` property to `true` causes the
element to be [invalid]($w.ValidatableMixin.html#.validity) if it
doesn't contain a value. Setting it to false allows the element to be
valid even if it doesn't contain a value. The validity of the element
can be checked using it's [`validity`]($w.ValidatableMixin.html#.validity)
property.
Getting the value of the `required` property returns whether the element
is required.
You can also set an input element to be required
by using the element's Settings pane in the Editor.
